page.topic: Configuring Internet Explorer after Running Maxthon

section.title: After Running MYIE2 (Maxthon)
section.description: Web publishing applications only. This condition has occurred when running on a LAN with a proxy server after switching from MYIE2 (Maxthon) to Internet Explorer. A dialog box may pop up requesting that you select a language.

step.description: Select Tools > Internet Options... to display the Internet Options dialog.
Display the Connections tab and click LAN Settings... .
In the Proxy server section check Use a proxy server for your LAN.
Check Bypass proxy server for local addresses.
